name: Curvy Coaster
description:
W - GO FASTER / S - GO SLOWER / SPACE - BOOST

Small "platforming" game for the Mini GameJam 128: Health . Restriction was "the only way to go is up". No preparation was done for this game.My Goal was to learn something NEW which i did with interpolation and creating curve paths.

You are moving on a set path and you can not stop (only slow down/go faster).

when you hit an obstacle you lose health. When your health drops to zero you start again. that the basic idea. Hope you like it or at least are a little invested. 

i had no time left to do fancy graphics or music/sound because i started late with this project.
